head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LEWIS, DAVID W.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LEWIS, DAVID W.

block.p: LEWIS-David W. Of Oradell, NJ on September 10, 2000. Graduated Cornell University in 1929. A vicepresident for Bankers Trust Company from 1934-1973. Husband of the late Eleanore Brett Lewis. Father of Patricia Bodnar and Eleanore M. Lewis. Grandfather of Kevin Bodnar and Allison Patterson. Funeral Service Wednesday, 8 PM at Volk-Leber Funeral Home, Oradell, NJ. Interment Mount Olivet Cemetery, Kenmore, NY. Visiting Wed, 2-4/7-9PM. In lieu of flowers donations to National Tuberous Sclerosis Association, 8181 Professional Pl., Suite 110, Landover, MD. 20785-2226.
